verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
All our joys, Lord, take and
bless all our sorrows, Lord,
take and bless all our lives,
Lord, take and bless,
O Lord, come and bless.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Bless the poor, Lord, bless
the poor, heal the sick, Lord,
heal the sick,
free the suffering,
Lord, free them all,
O Lord, free them all.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Feed the hungry, Lord
feed them all, help the lonely
Lord, help them all.
Feed the hungry, Lord,
feed them all.
O Lord, feed them all.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Give us peace, Lord,
give us peace, teach us love,
Lord, teach us love,
in your love,
Lord, make us one
O Lord, make us one.
